Long cardigan in a soft, loose knit with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.

Short, fitted dress in cotton twill with buttons down the front and a V-neck with a concealed press-stud at the top. Adjustable shoulder straps with large plastic buckles, side pockets with a decorative flap, and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Short, circular dress in woven fabric with wide straps that cross at the front and tie at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at one side. Unlined.
Short, circular dress in woven fabric with wide straps that cross at the front and tie at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at one side. Unlined.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with embroidery. V-neck with narrow ties and a small frill trim, a gathered seam at the shoulders, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons and a small frill trim. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Satin underdress.

Round shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a handle at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Two zipped main compartments and a zipped inner compartment. Studs on the base. Lined. Size 7x18.5 cm.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

3/4-length trousers in patent jersey. High waist with pleats at the front and shaping darts at the back, a zip fly and button, and diagonal side pockets. Relaxed fit.

Jacket in soft pile with a hood. Contrasting colour jersey lining and sewn-on ears. Zip down the front with a chin guard.

Dress in soft cotton jersey with a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Picot trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), short flutter sleeves and a decorative bow at the waist.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings. Top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and appliquéd print motifs above the hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings. Top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and appliquéd print motifs above the hems.

Set with an A-line top and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow trims. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Push-up bras in lace and jersey with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Dress in stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and gentle flare to the hem.
Dress in stretch cotton jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and gentle flare to the hem.

Dress in organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, a drawstring at the waist, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with large, reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Small purse in imitation leather with a zip at the top that continues down the short sides. Four card slots. Lined. Size 2x9x11.5 cm.

Longjohns in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Longjohns in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Waist-high briefs in lace with a V-shaped waist, and cut-out section at the back with wide satin ribbon ties. Lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Waist-high briefs in lace with a V-shaped waist, and cut-out section at the back with wide satin ribbon ties. Lined gusset and a high cut at the back.

Calf-length dress in an airy, textured, patterned cotton weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a V-neck with a tie detail and small opening at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam below the bust with pleats, and a flared skirt with lots of volume. Lined bodice.

Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a sheen. V-neck, wide ties that cross at the front and tie at the back, long gathered sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and a flared skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Dress in airy chiffon with embroidery on the front, a small stand-up collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a deeper opening at the front. Long sleeves with a flounce half-way down and elastication at the cuffs. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist. Jersey-lined front and a jersey underskirt.
Short, straight-cut dress in pattern-weave fabric with a sheen decorated with plastic sparkly stones front and back. Boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.

Playsuit in softly draping fabric with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and ties at the waist. Cut-out section at the back, a wide flounce over the shoulders that continues down the front, and flounces at the hems. Unlined.

Playsuit in softly draping fabric with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and ties at the waist. Cut-out section at the back, a wide flounce over the shoulders that continues down the front, and flounces at the hems. Unlined.
Pool shoes with a padded, rainbow-coloured fabric strap (sizes 7-9 also with an elastic heel strap) and fluted soles.
